column2: select  g.objid as galex_id, b.objid1 as objid, g.glon as glon, g.glat as glat, g.E_bv as ebv, g.nuv_mag as nuv_ab, g.nuv_magerr as nuv_err, g.fuv_mag as fuv_ab, g.fuv_magerr as fuv_err, s.u as u, s.err_u as u_err, s.g as g, s.err_g as g_err, s.r as r, s.err_r as r_err, s.i as i, s.err_i as i_err, s.z as z, s.err_z as z_err, s.type as type INTO mydb.GALEX_GR6_SDSS_DR8_Matched FROM GALEXGR6.PhotoObjAll as g  JOIN Match2.BestDR8xGR6 as b on b.objid2 = g.objid   JOIN Dr8.PhotoObjall as s on s.objid = b.objid1   JOIN Dr8.SpecobjAll as spec on s.specobjid = spec.specobjid where # = s.type   and s.clean = #   and spec.class = GALAXY   and spec.zWarning=#  and g.nuv_flux >#  and g.fuv_flux ># AND ((s.flags_r & #) != #) -- detected in BINNED1 AND ((s.flags_r & #) = #) -- not NOPROFILE, PEAKCENTER, NOTCHECKED, PSF_FLUX_INTERP, SATURATED, -- or BAD_COUNTS_ERROR. -- if you want to accept objects with interpolation problems for PSF mags, -- change this to: AND ((flags_r & #) = #) AND (((s.flags_r & #) = #) or (s.psfmagerr_r <= #)) -- not DEBLEND_NOPEAK or small PSF error -- (substitute psfmagerr in other band as appropriate) AND (((s.flags_r & #) = #) or (s.flags_r & #) = #) -- not INTERP_CENTER or not COSMIC_RAY - omit this AND clause if you want to -- accept objects with interpolation problems for PSF mags.
